CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Flash Newspicture Magazine, August 2, 1938, pg. 13, reads: "Beauticians in caps and gowns - Amid a background of ferns and flowers, the 1938 graduating class of Pitt's Ella-Rene School of Beauty Culture, receive their diplomas that grants them the privilege of launching into careers of beauty craft. The field of beauty culture, quite lucrative, is attracting thousands of students."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of graduates of Ella-Rene School of Beauty Culture posed in church
